metadata.name: Columbine high school
metadata.description:
The theme of this picture is the events that took place on April 20, 1999 at Columbine High School. 
It is a very loud story that took place over 20 years ago, but nevertheless the events continue to repeat themselves. Bullying is the culprit. Bullying at school, bullying at work, and even bullying at home. 

With this picture, I encourage everyone to stand up against bullying and help those who really need it first. We are all human beings regardless of the situations we find ourselves in. And only our actions can distinguish a man from an animal.

It is easier to bully than to help. Be strong...
